ssracos¶

This module contains the class SSRacos, which combines the noise handling method value suppression with SRacos.

Author:
Xiong-Hui Chen, Yu-Ren Liu
class ssracos.SSRacos[source]¶

This class implements SSRacos algorithm, which combines the noise handling method value suppression with SRacos.

__init__()[source]¶
get_best_solution(for_test=False)[source]¶

Find the best solution.

Parameters:for_test – if set for_test as False, this method will re-sample all of the solutions in positive data and then add them to possible solution before search the best solution.
Returns:return resample value if for_test is False otherwise return suppression value.
opt(objective, parameter, strategy='WR', ub=1)[source]¶

SSRacos optimization.

Parameters:
  • objective – a Objective object
  • parameter – a Parameter object
  • strategy – replace strategy
  • ub – uncertain bits, which is a parameter of SRacos
Returns:

the best solution of the optimization
sort_solution_list(solution_list, key=<function <lambda>>)[source]¶

Sort a solution list (eg. self._positive_data, self._possible_solution_list) with key

Parameters:
  • solution_list – the solution list to be sorted.
  • key – a function which input a solution and return its key.
Returns:

return a copy of sorted list(without change origin solution list).
update_possible_solution()[source]¶

Search all of solutions in self._positive_data, add it to self._possible_solution_list if not exist.
